user.activity.note.accessReader: Click on the + sign close to your name to play
user.activity.message.readinglog.full.wi: You've won the following prize for completing 10 hours of reading: [1]. \nPlease visit your local San Jose Public Library to claim your prize. Keep tracking your reading to earn more reading badges!
user.activity.message.readinglog.full: Keep tracking your reading to earn more reading badges!
user.activity.message.activityGrid.rowOr: You've won the following prize for completing 4 activity squares in a row: [1].\nPlease visit your local San Jose Public Library to claim your prize. \nComplete the entire activity grid for a chance to win more prizes!
user.activity.message.activityGrid.black: For completing all activities, you've won : [1]. \nPrize drawings will be conducted online. Please make sure you have a valid phone number or email listed on your account. We'll contact you if you win.
